pull.title: [Trivial] add comment about setting peer as HB peer.
pull.body:
This adds a comment to the new logic for setting HB peers based
on block validation (and aligns the code below to reflect the comment).
It's not obvious why we're checking mapBlocksInFlight. Add a comment to
explain.

@TheBlueMatt

events.message:
[Trivial] add comment about setting peer as HB peer.

This adds a comment to the new logic for setting HB peers based
on block validation (and aligns the code below to reflect the comment).
It's not obvious why we're checking mapBlocksInFlight. Add a comment to
explain.

events.body: Updated comment to "This is currently the best block we're aware of"

comments.body: Note that this also implies this is currently the best block we're aware of, not just the best block we have.
